definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: (from [[בָּלָה]], of the form [[דֶּלֶת]] Ol:§ 146 b) prop. failure, hence used as

definitions.title: particle of negation,
definitions.body: not, except (cf. [[בְּלִי]], [[אֶפֶס]]), twice with sf. (v. infr.), elsewhere always [[בִּלְתִּי]] (with binding vowel [[י]]—[[ִ]], as mark of cstr. state: Sta:§ 343 Ges:§ 90, 3), (Ph. [[בלת]] only: Tabnith-Inscr.:5)—†

definitions.title: 1. adv.
definitions.body: not, with an adj. 1Sa 20:26 [[בִּלְתִּי טָהוֹר]] not clean, with a subst. Is 14:6 [[מַכַּת בִּלְתִּי סָרָה]] a stroke of non-cessation, i.e. a never-ceasing stroke, with a finite vb. (si vera l.) Ez Eze 13:3 (RVm:but v. Dr:§ 41 Obs.). †

after a preceding negation, not = except (syn. [[זוּלָתִי]]), Ge 21:26 I have not heard [[בִּלְתִּי הַיּוֹם]] except to-day, Ex 22:19 he that sacrificeth ´[[בִּלְתִּי לי]] except unto ´[[י]], Nu 32:12, Jos 11:19: so [[בִּלְתִּי אִם]] Ge 47:18, Ju Jdg 7:14 (cf. [[כִּי אִם]] Ge 28:17, Ne 2:2). With sf. (attached to the ground-form [[בֵּלֶת]]) [[בִּלְתִּי]] except me †Ho 13:4, [[בִּלְתֶָּךָ]] expect thee † 1Sa 2:2. †

definitions.title: 3. conj.
definitions.body: (likewise after a neg., expressed or implied) Ge 43:3 [[בִּלְתִּי אֲחִיכֶם אִתְּכֶם]] except your brother (be) with you, v:Ge 43:5 Nu 11:6 our soul is dry, there is nothing at all; save that our eyes are toward the manna, Is 10:4 (and where will ye leave your glory ?) save that they bow down under the prisoners, and fall under the slain! i.e. (iron.) their only refuge will be among the corpses of a battle-field. So [[בִּלְתִּי אִם]] Am 3:3, Am 3:4.—Da 11:18, where no neg. precedes, it is difficult to extract a sense consistent with the gen. usage of [[בִּלְתִּי]]: Ges besides that his reproach he will return unto him, Ew only, nothing but, Hi certainly, Drechsler (on Is 10:4) nay, even (cf. RV).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[לְבִלְתִּי]]:86 so as not..., in order not... negation of [[לְ]] sq. inf.), usually sq. inf. cstr., as Ge 4:15 gave a sign to Cain [[לְבִלְתִּי הַכּוֹת־אׂתוֹ]] in order that any finding him should not smite him, Ge 19:21, Ge 38:9, Ex 8:18, Ex 8:25, Ex 9:17, Le 18:30, Le 20:4, Le 26:15, De 8:11, De 17:12 the man that doeth presumptuously [[לְבִלְתִּי שְׁמׂעַ]] so as not to hearken etc. (cf. Je 16:12, Je 17:23, Je 18:10, Je 42:13, Da 9:11) v:Da 9:20, Ju Jdg 2:23 +; [[לְבִלְתִּי הוֹעִיל]] in order not to profit (the result represented forcibly as the design; cf. sub [[לְמַעַן]]) Is 44:10, Je 7:8; after vbs. of commanding Ge 3:11 which I commanded thee [[לְבִלְתִּי אֲכָל־מִמֶּנּוּ]] not to eat thereof, 2Ki 17:15, Je 35:8 f.; Je 35:14, Ru 2:9, swearing De 4:21, Jos 5:6, Ju Jdg 21:7, Ez Eze 20:15, agreeing 2Ki 12:9, interceding Je 36:25. Once [[לְבִלְתִּי לְ]] 2Ki 23:10 (cf. [[לְמַעַן לְ]] Ez Eze 21:20, [[בַּעֲבוּר לְ]] 1Ch 19:3). Twice as conj. with the impf., Ex 20:20, 2Sa 14:14 (cf. [[בַּעֲבוּר]], & [[מִן]] De 33:11). In Je 23:14, Je 27:18 sq. perf., which is inconsistent with the nature of a final conj.: rd. either [[יׇשׁוּבוּ]], [[יׇבאׁוּ]], or [[שׁוּב]], [[בוֹא]] (cf. Dr:§ 41 Obs.). On Ez Eze 13:3 v. supr. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[מִבִּלְתִּי]] an account of not... (negation of [[מִן]] sq. inf.): sq. inf. Nu 14:16 ´[[מִבִּלְתִּי יְכׂלֶת י]]; a verbal noun Ez Eze 16:28 [[מִבִּלְתִּי שָׂבְעָתֵח]]. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[עַד־בִּלְתִּי]] until not..., sq. a perf. (Ges; RS:JPh xvi. 72), or an inf. (Ew:§ 238 d), in the phrase ([[לָהֶם]]) [[עַד־בִּלְתִּי הִשְׁאִיר־לוֹ]] [[שָׂרִיד]] until one left him (them) not a remnant, Nu 21:35, De 3:3, Jos 8:22, Jos 10:33, Jos 11:8, 2Ki 10:11.—Job 14:12 [[עַד־בִּלְתִּי שָׁמַיִם]] till there be no heaven (cf. [[עַד־בְּלִי]] Ps 72:7).
